lead_paragraph: A potash giant may soon emerge from the ashes of failed global matchmaking. Canadian fertilizer producers Potash Corp. and Agrium say they are discussing a merger. The potential deal follows a string of aborted industry combinations dating back to the Australian miner BHP Billiton’s $39 billion attempted buyout of Potash in 2010 — in retrospect, a dodged bullet for BHP.

headline.main: Potash Corp. and Agrium Discuss Merger Deal
